original_text: They could shoot with bows and arrows. They could use slings to throw stones with either their right hand or their left hand. They were relatives of Saul, from Benjamin's tribe. Their names were:
korean_text: 그들은 활을 가지며 좌우 손을 놀려 물매도 던지며 화살도 쏘는 자요 베냐민 지파 사울의 동족인데 그 이름은 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: They could shoot with bows and arrows
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 활과 화살로 쏠 수 있었고

sentences.original_text: They could use slings to throw stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 물매로 돌을 던질 수 있었고

sentences.original_text: with either their right hand or their left hand
